explains: v. 给……薪金（salary 的过去式和过去分词）
adj. 领薪水的；付给薪水的；（按月）领工资的
wordGroup: expected salary 期望得到的薪水
starting salary 起薪；入职薪酬
salary range 工资幅度；薪金范围
base salary 基本薪资（等于base pay）
salary administration 薪金政策的执行；薪酬管理
fixed salary 固定工资；固定薪额
salary earner 雇佣工人；受薪人士

sentences.en: The recent rise in prices tells heavily on low-salaried employees.
sentences.cn: 最近的物价上涨对低收入雇员的影响最大。

sentences.en: They had salaried jobs that paid well and gave them enough time off to enjoy their relative wealth.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作薪酬高而且有足够的假期享受他们相对富裕的生活。

sentences.en: Salaried employees receive the same pay from week to week regardless of the number of hours they work.
sentences.cn: 周薪制职员每周领取相同的工资，无论他们一周工作了多少小时。
